content_descriptors.notes:
Saint Ceri is intended for a mature audience and heavily features nudity and sexual content. All depicted characters are adults and all of the sex is consensual.

The overall story has the following warnings:
Frequent mentions of religion, blasphemy

The sexual content contains:
Soft femdom (the protagonist dominating male LIs and being dominated by a female LI)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.9 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
